descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26569-1-1352282189.jpg[/img]

This little mod adds a ring to your inventory (ring may be named in french but no importance).
Just equip this ring and you\'ll be asked if you like to convert one soul dragon in a skill point to be used in the skill tree.
Just answer yes/no that\'s all.

require SKSE !!!!!
No need to start a new game.

Suggestion: This mod was written to be used with my mod "No Skill Point by leveling - All languages" so your hero now gets a special skill-ability point because he has dragon blood and absorbed a soul instead of just because leveling !
Here the mod "No Skill Point by leveling - All languages"
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35271

Enjoy
author: marcousik
